model.fsa
Interface FSAEventsModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventsModel
public interface FSAEventsModel

Interface for managers responsible for synchronizing global and local event set (or alphabets).

Author:
Helen Bretzke

Method Summary
 void addGlobalEvent(FSAEvent e)
          Adds the given event to the global alphabet.
 void addLocalEvents(FSAModel fsa)
          Adds all events local to the given fsa to the set of global events.
 java.util.Set getGlobalEvents()
          Returns the global event set; all events in all models in the workspace.
 java.util.Set getLocalEvents(FSAModel fsa)
          Returns the set of events local to the given fsa.
 void pruneGlobalEvents()
          Removes any events from the global alphabet that do not appear in any of the local alphabets.
 

Method Detail

getGlobalEvents

java.util.Set getGlobalEvents()
Returns the global event set; all events in all models in the workspace.

Returns:
set of events in the global alphabet

getLocalEvents

java.util.Set getLocalEvents(FSAModel fsa)
Returns the set of events local to the given fsa.

Parameters:
fsa - the fsa for which to retrieve events
Returns:
set of events in the global alphabet

addGlobalEvent

void addGlobalEvent(FSAEvent e)
Adds the given event to the global alphabet.

Parameters:
e - the event to be added

addLocalEvents

void addLocalEvents(FSAModel fsa)
Adds all events local to the given fsa to the set of global events.

Parameters:
fsa - the model from which to add events

pruneGlobalEvents

void pruneGlobalEvents()
Removes any events from the global alphabet that do not appear in any of the local alphabets. WARNING: use with extreme caution; should have a flag set in any constructor to prevent frivolous use of this method.
